extracted_metadata.title: Return Conference /Maya al-Orza – The current situation of Palestinian refugees
extracted_metadata.description: How to say 'Awda in Hebrew? The 3rd International Conference on the Return of Palestinian Refugees From: 21-22/03/2016 Maya al-Orza from Badil - Resource Center for Palestinian Residency & Refugee Rights, Bethlehem "The current situation of Palestinian refugees", based on Badil’s Survey of Palestinian Refugees and Internally Displaced Persons 2013-2015 To watch the lecture in Arabic: • مؤتمر العودة / ذاكرات - مايا الأورزا من مر... To watch the lecture in Hebrew: • כנס השיבה / זוכרות / מאיה אל-אורזה – תמונת... *** about the conference: http://www.zochrot.org/en/event/56261 Like us on Facebook: / zochrot
